Class db

java.lang.Object
Database.db
public final class db extends Object
Thin DB utility - JDBC helpers and typed row DTOs. Straightforward, static-only. Reads config from env/.env, exposes simple query/insert/update methods.
Author:
Akil Daresalamwala
